io.netty.handler.codec.http2

Class Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase<T extends Http2ConnectionHandler,B extends Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase<T,B>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase<T,B>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of handler created by this builder.
    B - The concrete type for this builder.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Http2ConnectionHandler.Builder, HttpToHttp2ConnectionHandler.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    Http2ConnectionHandler

    public abstract static class Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase<T extends Http2ConnectionHandler,B extends Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase<T,B>>
extends Object
    Base class for a builder of any subclass of Http2ConnectionHandler.

      • frameListener

        public B frameListener(Http2FrameListener listener)
        Sets the listener for inbound frames. This listener will only be set if the decoder's listener is null.

        public B encoderEnforceMaxConcurrentStreams(boolean encoderEnforceMaxConcurrentStreams)
        Determine if the encoder should queue frames to honor the value set by encoderMaxConcurrentStreams(int).

      • encoderMaxConcurrentStreams

        public B encoderMaxConcurrentStreams(int encoderMaxConcurrentStreams)
        How many initial streams are allowed to exists concurrently. Frames will be queued if they would result in creating a stream which would cause the number of existing streams to exceed this number.
        See Also:
        encoderEnforceMaxConcurrentStreams(boolean)

      • build

        public final T build()
        Create a new Http2Connection and build a new instance.

      • build

        public final T build(Http2Connection connection)
        Build a new instance with an existing Http2Connection.

        Methods that will be ignored due to objects already being created:

        • server(boolean)

      • build

        public final T build(Http2ConnectionDecoder decoder,
      Http2ConnectionEncoder encoder)
        Build a new instance with an existing Http2ConnectionDecoder and Http2ConnectionEncoder.

        Methods that will be ignored due to objects already being created:

        • server(boolean)
        • #validateHttp2Headers(boolean)
        • frameLogger(Http2FrameLogger)
        • encoderEnforceMaxConcurrentStreams(boolean)
        • encoderMaxConcurrentStreams(int)

      • build0

        protected abstract T build0(Http2ConnectionDecoder decoder,
       Http2ConnectionEncoder encoder)
        Sub classes should override this to instantiate the concrete type.

        The return of this method will be subject to the following:

        • frameListener(Http2FrameListener) will be set if not already set in the decoder
        • gracefulShutdownTimeoutMillis(long) will be set

        protected B thisB()
